body_content.explanation: a natural quality that makes someone sexually attractive to other people:
examples: She was unprepared for the power of his sheer animal magnetism.
Animal magnetism can be an overwhelming force where teenage boys are involved.

body_content.explanation: according to a theory developed in the 18th century, a natural force in all living things that can have physical and mental effects on others:
examples: They believed in the healing of the human body through the animal magnetism of the healer.
